title: Accidentally tapped "deny", being asked if I wanted to allow verification code autofill from texts
content:
I have just purchased a Pixel 5 and I'm loving it, but I accidentally tapped "deny" when asked if I want to continue allowing for the phone to automatically fill verification codes from text messages.

How can I re-enable this? I checked the services under "autofill service" but only "Google" is there and already turned on.

Its a really handy feature and I would like it back.

Thanks all.
